Geocode: (1) The total Aboriginal identity population includes the Aboriginal groups (North American Indian  Métis and Inuit)  multiple Aboriginal responses and Aboriginal responses not included elsewhere.
Sources: Statistics Canada; censuses of population; 2001 and 2006.
